Question.Subject: What to do when I've forgotten UIC's net id password?
Question.Content: It's VERY important for me to obtain my password for UIC's net id system! If I dont log in to fill in housing applications, I may not get housing. I know my username, and I emailed consult@uic.edu for help. I only received an automated letter in return & that didn't help my situation. So to anyone who has forgotting their Net ID password before, could you possibly direct me as to what I can do to know my password ASAP?? thank you to all who read this! :)
Question.ChosenAnswer: Just do a search for yourself in the UIC phonebook http://www.uic.edu/searchUIC.html to find your netid If you forgotten your password go to the ACCC website and reset it. http://www.uic.edu/depts/accc/index.html/ACCTS.html

Answer.Content: Just do a search for yourself in the UIC phonebook http://www.uic.edu/searchUIC.html to find your netid If you forgotten your password go to the ACCC website and reset it. http://www.uic.edu/depts/accc/index.html/ACCTS.html
